# Nemo 

## *Rhinusa pilosa* Monitoring Grid, Biocontrol Caged & Open Release
<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=44.22548,-103.56796" target="_blank">Exclosure grid location</a>

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=44.22579,-103.56708" target="_blank">Control grid location</a>

Site activities:

- Build exclosure (grids already in place) 
- Setup trail cameras to monitor herbivory
- Build release cage ontop of existing monitoring transect
- Release *M. janthinus* biocontrol agents in cage and in open release transect
- Retrieve weather data from data loggers

# Sawyer *Mecinus janthinus* Releases
Our Sawyer site is located almost directly south of Deadwood, SD. We built a release cage on the exist caged-release transect. We also released *M. janthinus* in the cage and on the open transect. 

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=44.279,-103.69864" target="_blank">Caged release location</a>

<a href="https://www.google.com/maps?q=44.27884,-103.69842" target="_blank">Open release location</a>
